name: Hideout - Hide And Seek
description:
How many challenges can you overcome?
Completing the challenge will receive many attractive rewards
This is ideal initially with the hyper casual games

Diverse level system
Each level is a special way of solving puzzles
Funny character interface

Attractive gameplay Game

HOW TO PLAY
- Control Joystick to pick up BOX
- Remove your hand from the joystick to drop Box
